response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds immense value to us and is priced at $950,000, reflecting its unique features and quality. Given its worth to you, we believe this price offers a fair balance between value and investment. We are confident that this product will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Should you choose to proceed, we assure you of a seamless transaction and dedicated support throughout the process. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 950000}
